ptolemy.graph

Class GraphActionException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • ptolemy.kernel.util.KernelException
          • ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
            • ptolemy.graph.GraphActionException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GraphActionException
extends IllegalActionException
    Exception for graph action errors. This is a non-RuntimeException and should be caught by calling methods.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 2.1
    Author:
    Mingyung Ko
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Red (ssb)
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Red (myko)
